tool_description: Extracts minutiae points and ridge patterns from fingerprint images for identification and matching purposes.

enhancement_enabled.description: Whether to apply image enhancement preprocessing

minutiae_threshold.description: Minimum quality threshold for minutiae detection (0.1-1.0)

max_minutiae_count.description: Maximum number of minutiae points to extract

error_messages: Invalid fingerprint image: Provide valid base64 encoded fingerprint image data.
Poor fingerprint quality: Image quality too low for reliable minutiae extraction.
Invalid minutiae threshold: Threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid max minutiae count: Count must be between 10 and 200.
Insufficient ridge detail: Unable to extract sufficient ridge information from image.
usage: Provide fingerprint_image with optional enhancement and extraction parameters. The tool extracts minutiae points and ridge characteristics for fingerprint matching.

minutiae_points.description: Flattened array of minutiae coordinates and angles

minutiae_count.description: Total number of extracted minutiae points

core_point.description: Core point coordinates [x, y] if detected

delta_points.description: Delta point coordinates as flattened array
